predicate.note: Frames file for 'manufacture' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry create-26.4, the only other verb that mentions this class is 'mint' but there must be others. Comparison to 'make' and 'create'.

roleset.name: create

example.name: transitive
example.text: The company has been manufacturing carpet since 1967.

example.name: passive
example.text: That means goods could be manufactured *trace* closer to customers, saving shipping costs, he said.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: He said Tandy ``has done a decent job'' *trace* increasing sales by *trace* manufacturing computers for others...

roleset.note: Source might not occur. Do not tag adjectival or nominal usages: "The manufacturing sector" or "Manufacturing causes pollution."
